summary:
Driven by strong challenges, I bring a novel yet adaptive mentality. While being in a fast-paced environment I keep on top of things with a proactive attitude. With a natural feeling for commerce and customer needs I manage to translate their wishes into commercial products. My strength is to quickly understand the actions that need to be taken and push these through the whole organisation and internal departments. I am a real team player and manage to bring all the pieces, from each department, to a satisfying, finished project.  

At Coulisse I am the glue between field sales and the internal departments. In my job I make sure things are running smooth and on time while proactively working on new leads and projects. My positive nature, proactive attitude and experience not only allows me to manage challenging situations well, but also prioritize what is most beneficial for the business.

Working within the design and buying department of large Chinese multinational for almost four years, I led designs from creation to customer. In this role I oversaw the development of accessories collections for various markets in South America and Europe. I feel at ease working in fast paced environments and diverse cultures while being able to quickly understand the business dynamics and growth levers of the brands. Given my tenure, I bring about in-depth knowledge of managing relations with Chinese coworkers and international clients.

education.degree_name: Senior General Secondary Education / High School

certifications.name: Bachelor of Science : Technische Commerciële Textielkunde

profile_positions.description:
Coulisse is an innovative global window coverings specialist. Based on the belief that window coverings are so much more than just a functional product, we are redefining our market, to lift window coverings to a higher level and to put our partners ahead of the curve. From a unique design approach, we are developing advanced collections, innovative systems and smart technology. Operating from offices worldwide we service all kinds of customers, the DIY department services mainly large retailers and hardware stores all over Europe.

As Internal Account Manager in the DIY department, I am the point of contact for Coulisse's worldwide customers for commercial and technical questions about products and quotations. Here, I work closely with the order and project management, portfolio management, purchasing department and my sales colleagues. A big part of my job is coordinating projects from customers and bringing them together with the internal teams to a satisfying and completed project.  I ensure that all customer processes and the sales process run efficiently and that everything is executed on time. Part of this is proactively performing sales analyses, extracting sales opportunities and making quotations for them. I prepare customer visits, that I also attend, at home and abroad.
profile_positions.title: Internal Accountmanager DIY

profile_positions.description:
Europastry is a leader in the frozen bakery dough sector and currently operating in over 60 countries. Products are tailored to every preference, taste and consumption moment. We adapt to the needs and unique characteristics of each market through our  multi-local model. Customers include large supermarket chains all over Europe, Asia and South America as well as food service customers around the world. We produce high quality products such as bread, viennoiserie, patisserie and ready meals. 
At Europastry Central Europe I support the Accountmanagers with the management of sales and relationships of customers in Central Europe. 

My main activities are:
- Being the key between field sales and the other departments within the organisation. 
- Coördinating the set up of new products with our customers, from R&D process to final product in stores
- Marketing projects such as product branding, Europastry brand management (video campaigns, social media etc.) and supporting customers with marketing and visual materials of products created by me.
- Daily contact with customers as first point of contact for the sales department. Answer product questions, make offers and supply with information and marketing support.
- Daily contact with all different departments within Europastry to support and coördinate projects
- Coördinating pricing- and product information sheets
- Managing sample proces
- Working in JDEdwards, reviewing product information, internal database and stock.
- Reviewing sales and product data bases, such as Tableau and IRI
profile_positions.title: Account Support Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Level 10 Fashion, formerly known as Loka Fashion, is one of the leading manufacturers and exporters of fashion accessories in China. Customers include large retailers in North America, Europe, Asia and South America. Level 10 Fashion has several offices in China and other parts of the world. At Level 10 Fashion I am responsible for customers located in Europa and South America. Beside working with my colleagues on the main women collection I am head designer of the kids collection.

My main activities are:
- Daily contact with Chinese coworkers 
- Daily contact with customers
- Visiting factories and wholesale sellers
- Attending and leading client meetings
- Trend and market research and developing mood boards
- Material research and sourcing
- Designing accessories such as bags, jewelry and scarfs
- Quality check and follow up of produced samples
- Styling of in-house showroom
- Developing and designing accessories collections
- Supporting Account Managers
- Visiting (fabric) markets in Yiwu, Hangzhou and Guangzhou
- Attending fairs such as Intertextile Shanghai

In my role as Designer and Buyer, I have been in charge of leading design projects focusing on kids and women collections. As designer I work year-round on unique designs and developments according to the latest trends and to match each client’s demand. I coordinate from design to production the process together with colleagues from the relevant teams. These tasks have allowed me to visit multiple factories and product fairs
profile_positions.title: Buyer/Designer/Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a part of my study Technical Textile Engineering I did a six month internship at Level 10 Fashion,  formerly known as Loka Fashion. I was working on the West-European design and styling department. I supported the senior designer of this department.

Level 10 Fashion is one of the leading manufacturers and exporters of fashion accessories in China. Customers include large retailers in North America, Europe, Asia and Latin America. Level 10 Fashion has several offices in China and other parts of the world.

My main activities were:
- Daily contact with Chinese workers and European customers
- Visiting factories and wholesale sellers
- Attending client meetings
- Trend research and developing mood boards
- Material research
- Designing accessories such as bags, wallets, necklaces and scarfs
- Designing packaging of products
- Developing original prints
- Checking quality of produced samples
- Styling of in-house showroom
- Developing and designing accessories collections
- Visiting the Futianmarket, Yiwu
- Photoshopping
- Taking product pictures
profile_positions.title: Intern Stylist/Designer Accessories

profile_positions.description:
As a part of my study Technical Textile Engineering I did a five month internship at D-Dutch. I was working on the collection development department. Here I supported the manager of the department with the styling part.

D-Dutch is a joint Chinese-Dutch company established in 2006. We specialize in all kinds of accessories, products ranging from jewelry to cosmetics as well as many other fashion products. Our customers are independent retail shops, retail chains and wholesale distributors from Europe, U.S.A, Russia, South America and Asia.

My main activities were:
- Trendresearch and making moodboards
- Developing client orders
- Visiting wholesale sellers
- Visiting the Futianmarket, Yiwu
- Photoshopping
- Mainting the websites of the fashion accessories and make-up products.
- Taking product pictures for on the website
- Quality check of the samples
- Attending client meetings
- Styling of accessories collections 

Beside my internship I also conducted a research. I researched how the communication between the Chinese employees and the Dutch employees of D-Dutch could be improved. Saxion and D-Dutch were both pleased with the outcome and took it in consideration for the future.
profile_positions.title: Intern Buying/Stylist
